resources.string: Gabay
562840164924-e9nitg0grgf9vt21a3qsnacg04ke1etl.apps.googleusercontent.com

Gabay is designed to revolutionize the way you
 manage your travel expenses. Whether you're
 planning a weekend getaway or a long-term
 adventure, our app helps you stay organized, on
 budget, and focused on enjoying your journey.

At Gabay, our mission is to provide travelers with a
 seamless and efficient way to track their expenses,
 manage trips, and stay within budget. We believe
 that financial clarity is key to a stress-free travel
 experience, and we are committed to making that a
 reality for our users.

string.name: motto
string.i: Your personal financial guide in\n every “Gastos sa Paglalakbay”

resources.string:
Gabay is designed with simplicity in
 mind, ensuring that users can easily
 navigate through various features and
 functionalities.

Log your expenses effortlessly with
 detailed descriptions, dates,
 amounts, and categories
Create and manage multiple trips,\n each with its own budget and expense\n tracking.
Personalize your expense categories\n with custom names and icons for easy\n identification

Gabay is more than just an app; it's a commitment to
 helping you travel smarter. We strive to provide you
 with the best tools to manage your expenses, so you
 can focus on what truly matters—the adventure.

Our team consists of passionate developers,
 designers, and travel enthusiasts dedicated to
 making your travel experience as smooth as possible.
 We continuously work on improving Gabay to meet
 your needs and exceed your expectations.

b.i: “Thank you for choosing Gabay. Here\'s to stress-free travels and well-managed budgets!”

resources.string: Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or\n feedback. Happy travels!
gabaytravels@gmail.com

Log in to your Gabay account using your email and
password or you can log in using your Google Account.
If you're new to Gabay, sign up for an account by providing
your email and creating a password.
Log all expenses from your trips to ensure comprehensive\nfinancial records. You can enter your expenses from the trip\nform by clicking the floating add button to add an expense.

Monitor your expenses with the spending feature, which
offers an overview of your current spending status.
This includes a list of your recent expenses and the total
expenses recorded from your initial log to the most recent
one.
Within this category, you can view both your most recent\nspending activities as well as the cumulative total of all your\nexpenses.
Expense transactions entail recording all financial outlays\nassociated with your trips.
Expense transactions entail recording all financial outlays\nassociated with your trips.

Your budget sets a spending limit for each trip,
helping you manage expenses effectively.
This feature promotes financial discipline and ensures a
more organized and responsible travel experience.
It refers to the amount of money left from your budget after\ndeducting your total expenses.
This screen allows you to access all your trips, where you\ncan easily add new ones or modify and remove existing\nones as needed.

To add a new trip, simply click on the floating add button
located at the lower right corner of your screen.
Alternatively, tap on an existing trip to make edits.
You'll be prompted to input essential information to
create a new trip.
The date on which the Trip started.
The date on which the Trip ended.
To add an item to your trips, simply provide the necessary\ninformation when creating it. This includes details such as\nthe item name, amount, category, and date.
You can choose a category from the ones you\'ve created or\nfrom the pre-existing categories.

These are labels users assign to expenses for classification.
You can create custom categories or choose from
predefined ones covering common expense types like
transportation and accommodation. You can edit or create
new categories as needed. When adding expenses,
you can select the appropriate category for accurate tracking
and analysis.
